labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The message does not delete, and the file does not upload/send
data.expected_result: The message is supposed to delete, or the file is supposed to send
data.short_description: Using 'ENTER' to delete a message via editing and clearing the text, or sending a file with no text doesn't work.
data.steps_to_repro: - Edit a previously sent message - clear the text - hit 'ENTER - OR - Drag a file, or click '+' - leave the text blank - hit 'ENTER' to send
